input.sentences: this owner was well prepared for a glass of tea .
his partner gave the lecture for the day .
he also had a supporting presentation .
their team was effective in teaching us the principles .
there were a lot of pictures on the wall .
output.sentences: John prepared tea and sat down to talk to the owner of the house about selling it.
John is an agent at a real estate firm, where he often hears stimulating talks, including a lecture today.
Team work is valued at the firm and senior staff often presents teaching principals that support work bonding.
The lobby of the firm has a wall full of colorful pictures, a lot of them, which are added to often.
